trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBWIL018_00396_SEQ_00<tab>Lady Genevieve wants you to gather the gil which you caused her to drop on the ground.
TEXT_SUBWIL018_00396_SEQ_01<tab>Shocked at being addressed by a common adventurer, Lady Genevieve has dropped a large quantity of gil on the ground. Collect the coins and beg forgiveness.
TEXT_SUBWIL018_00396_SEQ_02<tab>You have gathered all of Genevieve's gil. Return it to her before you receive another scolding.
TEXT_SUBWIL018_00396_SEQ_03<tab>Lady Genevieve is mollified upon receiving her precious gil. Rather than offering any words of gratitude, she gives you a pittance and proceeds to ignore you.
TEXT_SUBWIL018_00396_GENEVIEVE_000_2<tab>What have you <var 1A 02 /var>done<var 1A 01 /var>!? Your kind has no business to even <var 1A 02 /var>look<var 1A 01 /var> at a lady such as I.
TEXT_SUBWIL018_00396_GENEVIEVE_000_3<tab>Such shocking, unbelievable insolence! And now look─look at how my gil is scattered across the ground!
TEXT_SUBWIL018_00396_GENEVIEVE_000_10<tab>My gil...<var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var>! And there had better be naught missing!
TEXT_SUBWIL018_00396_GENEVIEVE_000_12<tab>...What are you still staring at? Are you expecting some kind of reward? The insolence! Hmph!
